content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: variable_label
      operator: longer_than
      value: 40
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.3
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise and error if Variable label length > 40 characters
Outcome:
  Message: Variable label length should be less than or equal to 40 characters
Rule Type: Variable Metadata Check
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: 3
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A descriptive Variable Label, using up to 40 characters,
                  which should be unique for each variable in the dataset.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 3.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise and error if Variable label length > 40 characters

Outcome.Message: Variable label length should be less than or equal to 40 characters

Citations.Cited_Guidance: A descriptive Variable Label, using up to 40 characters, which should be unique for each variable in the dataset.
